Name: Colors!
About the game: Colors! is a minimalist casual puzzle game with relaxing music. The player interacts only with the mouse to solve the puzzles. ⮞ 45 Levels ⮞ 90 Achievements ⮞ Easy Puzzles ⮞ Intuitive Interface ⮞ Relaxing music
